department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Contract for geotechnical investigation at CCGC Davit Wharf.
full_summary:
____________________________________________________________________


## Government Tender Announcement
### RFP - CCGC Davit Wharf - Geotechnical Investigation

**Reference Number:** WS4591177614-Doc4591179989
**Solicitation Number:** WS4591177614
**Publication Date:** May 17, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 4, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** June 10, 2024

**Project Overview:** Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) invites proposals for a geotechnical investigation at the Canadian Coast Guard College (CCGC) in Sydney, Cape Breton, Nova Scotia.

**Background:** The development of the Davit Wharf at the CCGC requires a comprehensive geotechnical investigation to inform the design and construction phases. The selected firm will conduct a thorough investigation, including site visits, data collection, and analysis.

**Applicable Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Evaluation Criteria:** Proposals will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The selected firm must demonstrate expertise in geotechnical engineering and provide a detailed method statement for the investigation.

**Submission Requirements:** Proposals must be submitted in either English or French. The RFP document and supporting materials are available on the Government of Canada's buying and selling website.

**Contracting Entity:** The contracting entity for this project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

**Contact Information:**
- Rachel Miller (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: [rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Phone: Not applicable
- Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
